mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dorm_area_info ( area_id, area_name, building_count ) VALUE (#{areaId}, #{areaName}, #{buildingCount});
INSERT INTO building_info ( building_id, building_name, floor_count ) VALUE (#{buildingId}, #{buildingName}, #{floorCount});
mapper.select: SELECT b.building_id, b.floor_count, dai.area_name 'dormArea.area_name' FROM building_info b LEFT JOIN dorm_area_info dai ON b.area_id = dai.area_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO floor_info ( floor_id, dorm_count building_id, area_id ) VALUE (#{floorId}, #{dormCount}, #{buildingId},#{areaId});
mapper.select: SELECT f.floor_id, f.dorm_count, b.building_id 'building.building_id', dai.area_name 'dormArea.area_name' FROM floor_info f LEFT JOIN building_info b ON f.building_id=b.building_id LEFT JOIN dorm_area_info dai ON f.area_id = dai.area_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dorm_basic_info ( dorm_id, bedding_count, floor_id ) VALUE (#{dormId}, #{beddingCount},#{floorId});
mapper.select: SELECT dbi.dorm_id, dbi.bedding_count, fi.floor_id 'floor.floor_id', fi.dorm_count 'floor.dorm_count', b.building_id 'building.building_id', dai.area_name 'dormArea.area_name' FROM dorm_basic_info dbi LEFT JOIN floor_info fi ON dbi.floor_id=fi.floor_id LEFT JOIN building_info b ON dbi.building_id=b.building_id LEFT JOIN dorm_area_info dai ON dbi.area_id = dai.area_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dorm_student_info ( dorm_student_id, dorm_id, student_id, have_product ) VALUE (#{dormStudentId}, #{dormId}, #{studentId},#{haveProuct});
mapper.select: SELECT dsi.dorm_student_id, s.student_name 'student.student_name', s.stu_id 'student.stu_id', dbi.dorm_id 'dormitory.dorm_id', dbi.bedding_count 'dormitory.bedding_count', fi.floor_id 'floor.floor_id', fi.dorm_count 'floor.dorm_count', b.building_id 'dormitory.floor.building.building_id', dai.area_name 'dormArea.area_name' FROM dorm_student_info dsi LEFT JOIN student s ON dsi.student_id=s.stu_id LEFT JOIN dorm_basic_info dbi ON dsi.dorm_id=dbi.dorm_id LEFT JOIN floor_info fi ON dsi.floor_id=fi.floor_id LEFT JOIN building_info b ON dsi.building_id=b.building_id LEFT JOIN dorm_area_info dai ON dsi.area_id = dai.area_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dorm_welcome_info ( dorm_res_id, res_name, res_number, dorm_id ) VALUE (#{dormResId}, #{resName}, #{resNumber},#{dormId});
mapper.select: SELECT dwi.dorm_res_id, dwi.res_number, dwi.res_name, dbi.dorm_id 'dormitory.dorm_id', dbi.bedding_count 'dormitory.bedding_count', fi.floor_id 'floor.floor_id', fi.dorm_count 'floor.dorm_count', b.building_id 'dormitory.floor.building.building_id', dai.area_name 'dormArea.area_name' FROM dorm_welcome_info dwi LEFT JOIN dorm_basic_info dbi ON dwi.dorm_id=dbi.dorm_id LEFT JOIN floor_info fi ON dwi.floor_id=fi.floor_id LEFT JOIN building_info b ON dwi.building_id=b.building_id LEFT JOIN dorm_area_info dai ON dwi.area_id = dai.area_id

SELECT dwi.dorm_res_id, dwi.res_name, dwi.res_number, dwi.dorm_id, dwi.floor_id, dwi.building_id, dai.area_name 'dormArea.area_name' FROM ( SELECT * FROM dorm_welcome_info WHERE dorm_res_id =#{dormResId} ) dwi LEFT JOIN dorm_area_info dai ON dwi.area_id = dai.area_id
mapper.update: UPDATE dorm_welcome_info SET res_name = #{resName}, res_number = #{resNumber}, dorm_id = #{dormId}, floor_id = #{floorId}, building_id = #{buildingId}, area_id = #{areaId} WHERE dorm_res_id=#{dormResId}
